source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000010_AYMERIC<tab>To think the moogles would prove such harsh taskmasters! Forgive me, I did not know you had suffered so in your quest for the horn.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000010_AYMERIC<tab>……それで、雲海のモーグリ族にこき使われたのか！
なるほど、あのラッパは、君の苦労の結晶だったわけだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000020_AYMERIC<tab>I must say, your spirited accounts always come as a welcome change from the arid reports which fill my days.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000020_AYMERIC<tab>ふふ、君の旅の話は飽きないな。
報告として聞いたときとは違う発見がある。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000030_AYMERIC<tab>Though I have lived in these lands my entire life, to hear you speak of them, there is much and more I have yet to see. Truly, yours was a marvelous journey.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000030_AYMERIC<tab>ずっとこの地で生きてきたというのに、
君の目を通して見ると、まるで別世界のようだ。
……いいものだな、旅というのは。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_Q1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_Q1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>アイメリクに何と言う？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_A1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Though perhaps a bit long for my liking.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_A1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>長い旅だった

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_A1_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Why not join me on the next?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_A1_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>……旅してみる？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_A1_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>It wasn't all sunshine and lemoncakes.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_A1_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>いいことばかりでもない

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000040_AYMERIC<tab>Long <var 1A 02 /var>and<var 1A 01 /var> arduous, aye. Not unlike the journey that Ishgard has at last embarked upon─thanks to the efforts of you and yours.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000040_AYMERIC<tab>ああ、そうだろうとも。
イシュガルドが千年も為せなかった偉業……
我々をそこへと導いた君の旅は、長く険しかったと思う。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000050_AYMERIC<tab>Hah! Well...truth be told, when I think back on the sweeping vistas of the Churning Mists, I do feel some slight pangs of wanderlust...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000050_AYMERIC<tab>まさか、誘ってくれるのか……！？
実は私も、先にドラヴァニア雲海で見た風景を思い出しては、
まだ見ぬ地を目指してみたいものだと思っていてな？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000060_AYMERIC<tab>Alas, much as I would like to accept your invitation, I fear my present duties with the House of Lords demand my undivided attention. Someday, perhaps.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000060_AYMERIC<tab>喜んで、君の誘いを受けたい……
と思うのだが、今はまだ議長を引き受けたばかりの身。
それは、いつかの夢にとっておくことにしよう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000070_AYMERIC<tab>Nor would I presume to imply otherwise. Neither I nor any man alive can truly understand what you have endured, and I cannot say with any confidence that I would have acquitted myself as well under the circumstances─much less grown stronger for it.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000070_AYMERIC<tab>おっと……すまない、軽んじるつもりはないんだ。
その旅路に困難や苦悩があったからこそ、
君はそれほど強いのだろう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000080_AYMERIC<tab>By your deeds, you have helped us to lay the foundation for lasting reform.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000080_AYMERIC<tab>……君に助けられて、今やっと、
この国は真の変革を迎えることができた。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000090_AYMERIC<tab>The formation of the republic is but the beginning, for it is not only our system of governance which must needs change. We the people must learn to let go of our hatreds and rise above our bloody past.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000090_AYMERIC<tab>だが、共和制への移行ですら、変革のたった一歩に過ぎない。
これからのイシュガルドは、制度の面のみならず、
民ひとりひとりが変わらねばならない時期を迎えるはずだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000100_AYMERIC<tab>I only pray that I live long enough to see us achieve some measure of success─that I might know the lost did not die in vain.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000100_AYMERIC<tab>私の生きているうちに、果たして安定するものか……
先が見えない道だが、戦いに散った者のためにも進んでいこう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000110_AYMERIC<tab>I can still see you there, on the Steps of Faith, striding fearlessly towards the wyrm... If you could do that, who are we to balk at the challenges ahead?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000110_AYMERIC<tab>何より、この目には今も、
邪竜に向かって進む君の背中が、しかと焼き付いているのだ。
それを追わずに立ち止まることなど、できるはずがないだろう？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000120_AYMERIC<tab>The question of how best to strengthen ties with the other great nations of Eorzea has been debated at length in the Lords and Commons of late.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000120_AYMERIC<tab>今、新設された議会では、
他国とどのように協力関係を築くべきか、
議論が進められている。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000130_AYMERIC<tab>As you may imagine, maintaining stability during this period of historic upheaval is our paramount concern. Nevertheless, we are greatly indebted to the Alliance for their support during the grand melee, and it would be remiss of us not to repay their faith in kind.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000130_AYMERIC<tab>無論、当面は国内の平定が最優先ではあるが、
先の合同演習についての恩もある……
できることから、協力をしていきたい。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000140_AYMERIC<tab>Of course, we owe you the greatest debt of all, and it is my hope that in extending our support to you and the Scions, we might also express our gratitude to our neighbors─nay, our fellow Eorzeans, whom we pray you will continue to protect.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000140_AYMERIC<tab>他ならぬ君にもだ。
君に報いることが、「暁」だけでなく、
三国、ひいてはエオルゼアへの恩返しになるだろう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000150_AYMERIC<tab>The Lords and Commons agree on very little, but not a soul in either house begrudges your order this offer of patronage. For all you have done and will do, we thank you.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000150_AYMERIC<tab>この地の民の誰もが、そう信じて疑わないほどのことを、
君はやりとげてくれたということだ。
本当に……ありがとう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000160_AYMERIC<tab>...May I ask a personal question?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000160_AYMERIC<tab>……ところで。
これは、議長としてではなく、ごく個人的な興味なのだが。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000170_AYMERIC<tab>Now that the dust has settled, what will you do? Not as a Scion, I mean, but...what do you want for yourself?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000170_AYMERIC<tab>君は、これからどうするつもりだ？
「暁」としての目的というより……
君自身の想いを聞かせてくれないか。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000180_MESSENGER02341<tab>Lord Commander, pray forgive the interruption!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000180_MESSENGER02341<tab>お食事中、失礼いたします！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000190_AYMERIC<tab>News from House Fortemps?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000190_AYMERIC<tab>フォルタン家の……？
何かあったのか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000200_MESSENGER02341<tab>An urgent message for the Warrior of Light. I was instructed to deliver it without delay.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000200_MESSENGER02341<tab>ハッ！
そちらの英雄殿に、至急お伝えすることがあり、
無礼を承知で案内していただきました。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000210_MESSENGER02341<tab>Master Thancred returned to the manor a short time ago, bearing an injured maiden.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000210_MESSENGER02341<tab>先ほど、サンクレッド様が、負傷したお仲間を連れ、
フォルタン伯爵邸に駆け込んでいらっしゃったのです。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000220_MESSENGER02341<tab>Master Leveilleur and Mistress Tataru are tending to her wounds, but they like not her chances. Respectfully, my lord─they have requested the Warrior of Light's immediate presence.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000220_MESSENGER02341<tab>アルフィノ様とタタル様が手当てにあたっておいでですが、
あまり状態がよろしくないらしく……
至急、いらしてほしいとのことです！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000230_AYMERIC<tab>You must go to them, my friend. And I shall go with you.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000230_AYMERIC<tab>私も行こう。
手を貸せることがあるかもしれない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000240_PAPALYMO<tab>For every ending marks a new beginning.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000240_PAPALYMO<tab>ここからは かの伯爵の回顧録には綴られない物語

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000250_PAPALYMO<tab>From tragedy and sacrifice we rise to greet a new dawn. As did <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var>.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000250_PAPALYMO<tab>終わりは 始まり……
英雄と呼ばれた冒険者は こうしてまた歩み出した

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000260_PAPALYMO<tab>Only to be drawn unto another battlefield, another cause, as if by fate...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000260_PAPALYMO<tab>彼方に広がる 新たな戦いの舞台へと
まるで 世界に導かれるように……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000270_ALISAIE<tab>Th...As─ Ugh... <gasp>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000270_ALISAIE<tab>はぁ……はぁ……ううっ…………。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000280_AYMERIC<tab>Is that...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000280_AYMERIC<tab>これは、いったい……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000290_THANCRED<tab>Alisaie, Alphinaud's twin sister.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000290_THANCRED<tab>彼女は、アリゼー……
アルフィノ様の、双子の妹君さ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000300_THANCRED<tab>She ran afoul of the Warriors of Darkness.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000300_THANCRED<tab>……やられたよ、闇の戦士たちだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000310_THANCRED<tab>I had been tracking them since the ceremony at Falcon's Nest. Little did I know I was not the only one.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000310_THANCRED<tab>ファルコンネストでの式典のあと、
連中の足取りを追っていたんだが……
黒衣森で、闇の戦士に狙われたアリゼー様を助けてな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000320_THANCRED<tab>Evidently she had learned of their activities and attempted to shadow them on her own. Poorly.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000320_THANCRED<tab>彼女も、別の線から連中に疑念を抱いて、
独自に追跡を続けていたらしい。

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000330_THANCRED<tab>I rescued her in the Twelveswood, and together we fled north. But though I made every effort to cover our tracks, they caught up with us on the Ishgardian border, and in the ensuing struggle, Alisaie took an arrow to the shoulder.
'Twas only after we had made good our escape that I realized it was poisoned...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000330_THANCRED<tab>一時は、追っ手を完全に振り切れたと思ったんだが、
クルザスに入る手前で、奴らの一味に強襲された。
アリゼー様は、交戦中に毒矢を受けてな……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000340_ALPHINAUD<tab>Thank you for coming so quickly. And you, Ser Aymeric.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000340_ALPHINAUD<tab>急に呼び立てて申し訳ない。
アイメリク卿も、来ていただけて助かります。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000350_AYMERIC<tab>Think nothing of it. How is she?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000350_AYMERIC<tab>こちらは構わない。
しかし、妹君の容態は……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000360_ALPHINAUD<tab>We have done all we can for now. Although the immediate danger has passed, the poison yet lingers in her blood...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000360_ALPHINAUD<tab>……応急処置は施しました。
今すぐに命を落とすようなことはないでしょう。
ですが、症状が治まらず、衰弱しきっている……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000370_ALPHINAUD<tab>We came to Eorzea together, hoping to bring salvation to the realm our grandfather gave his life to protect.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000370_ALPHINAUD<tab>妹……アリゼーは、私と同じ……
祖父ルイゾワが命をかけて守ったエオルゼアを、
見定め、救うためにやってきたのです。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000380_ALPHINAUD<tab>But when confronted with the bitter realities of its politics and its petty powermongers, she was driven to anger─and to doubt.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000380_ALPHINAUD<tab>しかし、この地で見たのは、
人同士のいさかいや、欺瞞と綺麗ごとばかりにも思える政治……
彼女はひどく怒り、悩んでいました。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000390_ALPHINAUD<tab>She refused to become embroiled in what she termed Eorzea's “squabbles,” and distanced herself from the Scions.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000390_ALPHINAUD<tab>そして、そういった問題に関わろうとする、
私や「暁」と距離を置いた……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000400_ALPHINAUD<tab>Though she remained hopeful of a brighter future, she would walk her own path. Would that it had not been so perilous...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000400_ALPHINAUD<tab>彼女は、彼女なりのやり方で、
エオルゼアの明日を模索するといっていました。
きっと今回も、そのために闇の戦士を……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000410_ALPHINAUD<tab>For all our differences, she is as dedicated as any Scion to the salvation of Eorzea. But more than that, she is my sister...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000410_ALPHINAUD<tab>アイメリク卿、彼女は「暁」の一員ではありませんが、
エオルゼアを救いたいという思いをともにする仲間。
何より……私の大事な妹なのです。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000420_ALPHINAUD<tab>To be reunited with her, only to lose her forever... Gods, even to speak the words...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000420_ALPHINAUD<tab>どうか、彼女の治療に、
ご助力いただけないでしょうか……！？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000430_AYMERIC<tab>Take heart, Master Alphinaud. She will be attended by our most skilled chirurgeons.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000430_AYMERIC<tab>断る理由があるものか。
治癒師を手配し、最善を尽くさせよう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000440_AYMERIC<tab>Bear Mistress Leveilleur to the infirmary at once. Apprise Captain Whitecape of the situation, and inform him that she is to be treated as my personal charge.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000440_AYMERIC<tab>彼女を、神殿騎士団病院へ。
院長のエーベル殿に事情を説明し、治療にあたってくれ。
責任は私が負うと伝えてくれていい。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000450_ALISAIE<tab>W-Wait... D-Don't go... Please, come closer...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000450_ALISAIE<tab>待って…………。
あなたたちに……話さなきゃいけないことが……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000460_ALISAIE<tab>Alphinaud... Is the Warrior of Light... Is <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> with you? D-Don't go...there is something I must say...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000460_ALISAIE<tab>アルフィノ……あの人が、そこにいるの……？
だったら、お願い……私の話を…………。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000470_ALISAIE<tab>The Warriors of Darkness are in league with the Ascians... Slaughtering the primals is but the first step in their plan...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000470_ALISAIE<tab>闇の戦士は、アシエンと結託してる……。
蛮神を討伐してまわっているのも、企みの一環よ……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000480_ALISAIE<tab>They make for Xelphatol to bring about Garuda's summoning... And to kill her...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000480_ALISAIE<tab>次は、「ゼルファトル」の地で、
蛮神「ガルーダ」を再召喚させると言っていた……。
倒すために、わざとね……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000490_ALISAIE<tab>You must... You must stop them...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000490_ALISAIE<tab>どうか、蛮神「ガルーダ」の再召喚を……
奴らの企みを、阻止、して……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000500_TATARU<tab>I...I shall inform the others at once!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000500_TATARU<tab>あ、あのっ、あのっ！
私、ほかの賢人のみなさんにも、連絡してくるでっす……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000510_AYMERIC<tab>Master Thancred─I would ask that you accompany Mistress Leveilleur to the infirmary. Your knowledge of her injuries may well prove useful in determining her treatment.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000510_AYMERIC<tab>サンクレッド殿、
病室まで、アリゼー殿に付き添っていただけるだろうか？
毒を特定するために、証言をお願いしたい。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000520_THANCRED<tab>Of course.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000520_THANCRED<tab>ああ、了解した。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000530_ALPHINAUD<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000530_ALPHINAUD<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000540_ALPHINAUD<tab>So they were unable to see the ritual to its completion... Then Garuda is no longer a threat, and whatever the Ascians and the Warriors of Darkness were planning has come to naught...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000540_ALPHINAUD<tab>そうか、蛮神「ガルーダ」は、
完全な再召喚に至らなかったのだな。
これで、アシエンと闇の戦士の企みも挫けただろうか……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000550_ALPHINAUD<tab>But we should not tarry. The knights have secured our path to safety.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000550_ALPHINAUD<tab>ともかく、ここを脱出しよう。
騎兵たちが、退路を確保してくれているんだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000560_PALADINOFDARKNESS<tab>(-???-)Well, well... What do we have here? You'd better not have killed the primal without us!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000560_PALADINOFDARKNESS<tab>(-？？？？-)ンン……？
こいつァ、驚いた。
まさか先手を打たれるなんてなァ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000570_ALPHINAUD<tab><var 1A 02 /var>You<var 1A 01 /var>!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000570_ALPHINAUD<tab>闇の戦士たち……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000580_BARDOFDARKNESS<tab>Wait, I know you! Still walking, I see. I could have <var 1A 02 /var>sworn<var 1A 01 /var> my aim was true...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000580_BARDOFDARKNESS<tab>あれ……あの子、アタシの毒矢で仕留めなかったっけ？
おっかしいなー。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000590_PALADINOFDARKNESS<tab>Just what is your game? Leading us the long way, so these fools could step in and claim our prize?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000590_PALADINOFDARKNESS<tab>「案内人」さんよォ、こいつはどういうことだ。
まさか、奴らのために時間を稼いだわけじゃねェだろうな？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000600_WHITEMAGEOFDARKNESS<tab>Now, now. Let's not make hasty accusations. By the look of things, the ritual was proceeding as planned.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000600_WHITEMAGEOFDARKNESS<tab>落ち着いてください。
この様子では、どのみち蛮神「ガルーダ」再召喚の準備は、
整いきっていなかったのでしょう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000610_WHITEMAGEOFDARKNESS<tab>We arrived at the appointed hour. 'Twas they who erred.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000610_WHITEMAGEOFDARKNESS<tab>私たちは、予定どおりに到着した……。
しかし、彼らの方がなお早かったというだけです。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000620_ALPHINAUD<tab>It is hopeless. We cannot face them all...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000620_ALPHINAUD<tab>まずいぞ……
私たちだけで、彼ら全員を相手取るのは、
分が悪すぎる……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000630_BARDOFDARKNESS<tab>Do mine ears deceive? A <var 1A 02 /var>boy<var 1A 01 /var>! So <var 1A 02 /var>that's<var 1A 01 /var> the way of it. Twins! You had me worried for a moment there.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000630_BARDOFDARKNESS<tab>……ああ、そーいうこと。
兄弟……いや、双子かな？
よく似てるねー。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000640_BARDOFDARKNESS<tab>Know that I will happily make it quicker for you...if you just stand still.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000640_BARDOFDARKNESS<tab>んじゃ、こっちの子も、
二度とアタシたちの邪魔できないように、
お仕置きしとかなくっちゃね！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000650_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Enough, J'rhoomale. We wouldn't want to upset the man in white with any unnecessary bloodshed, now would we?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000650_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>……やめておけ、ジャ・ルマレ。
あまり予定外を増やすと、
白法衣の野郎の作戦に支障をきたす。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000660_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>You've been awfully busy since we were kind enough to spare your lives.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000660_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>前回俺たちを取り逃がした甘ッタレにしちゃ、
頑張ったみたいじゃねぇか。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000670_ALPHINAUD<tab>While you were <var 1A 02 /var>idly<var 1A 01 /var> consorting with the Ascians, you mean? Seven hells! What could you possibly hope to achieve!?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000670_ALPHINAUD<tab>君たちは……本当に、アシエンの協力者なのか？
なぜ？　目的は何なんだ……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000680_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Should I explain it to you? Very well. Consider it a reward of sorts for beating us here.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000680_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>フン……。
いいぜ、俺たちを出し抜いた褒美に、
その質問にだけ答えてやるよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000690_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>You know the tale of Hydaelyn and Zodiark, I take it. Of the great sundering, and the reflections it created?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000690_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>太古の昔……光たる「ハイデリン」が、
力を増し過ぎた闇「ゾディアーク」を封じる際に、
鏡像の世界が生じたって話は知ってるか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000700_ALPHINAUD<tab>Across ten and three they were divided. Reflections of the Source, each possessed of shards of Light and Dark...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000700_ALPHINAUD<tab>あ、ああ……。
ここが「原初世界」で、ほかに13の鏡像世界があり、
それぞれに光と闇の力が封じられている、と……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000710_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Just so. One of those reflections─the one nearest to the Source─is our home. And we were the heroes blessed with Her Light.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000710_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>そうだ。
そして俺たちは、その鏡像世界……
第一世界の「光の加護を受けし者」さ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000720_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>But not all worlds hold Light and Dark in equal measure. In ours, the power of Light was greater by far.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000720_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>光と闇の力は、すべての世界に平等に封じられたわけじゃない。
俺たちの世界は、特に光の力が強かった……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000730_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>So the Ascians who once threatened our home were no match, and they fell before us, one after another, till none were left. Victory, we thought...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000730_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>故に、俺たちは比類なき力を得て、闇を払った。
アシエンはもちろん、俺たちの世界を脅かす、
ありとあらゆる闇をな……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000740_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>...And then came the Light─a flood of pure, blinding radiance, annihilating shadow and color and <var 1A 02 /var>life itself<var 1A 01 /var>. Ere long, it will consume our world, leaving naught in its wake but blank perfection.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000740_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>その結果、どうなったと思う？
……強くなりすぎた光の力が氾濫し、俺たちの第一世界は、
今まさに「完全な無」となりかけてるのさ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000750_ALPHINAUD<tab>That─ That cannot be! Do you honestly expect us to believe such a story!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000750_ALPHINAUD<tab>そんな話を……信じろというのか！？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000760_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Believe what you like. But it has happened before, on a world far removed from ours. The Thirteenth, which was swallowed by the Dark, and transformed into what you call the void.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000760_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>フン、ありえないとは言えないはずだぜ？
お前らのよく知る、異界「ヴォイド」……
あれは、闇の氾濫によって無になった、第十三世界だ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000770_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Unchallenged Light would condemn us to a similar fate. And so we joined hands with our former enemies, and with their aid came here...to the Source.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000770_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>俺たちは、光の氾濫から故郷を救うため、
かつての仇敵アシエンと手を組み、この原初世界に渡ってきた。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000780_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>For there is but one way to restore the balance and save our home: the Ardor. Calamitous destruction with the power to break down the barriers between planes, and see our worlds rejoined.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000780_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>俺たちの故郷を救う唯一の方法は、
この世界でアーダー、つまり「霊災」を起こすこと……
そうして次元の壁を壊し、第一世界を原初世界に統合する。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000790_ALPHINAUD<tab>You would doom our world to save your own!? What would even become of us? Of you?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000790_ALPHINAUD<tab>世界の、統合……！
しかし、それは本当に救いなのか？
統合された方の世界は……第一世界はどうなる！？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000800_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Enough. I tire of talking.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000800_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>……追加の質問はナシだぜ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000810_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>You know our cause. You know what is at stake. We are prepared to do whatever it takes! Are you?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000810_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>正義の味方を気取りたいなら、指を咥えて静観してな。
何も知らない、甘ッタレどもが！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000820_ALPHINAUD<tab>If there is aught you would say, say it. Otherwise, begone. You have no friends here.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000820_ALPHINAUD<tab>あなたも、闇の戦士の仲間なのか……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000830_ALPHINAUD<tab>Alisaie! How are you feeling?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000830_ALPHINAUD<tab>アリゼー！
もう起きられるのかい？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000840_ALISAIE<tab>Well enough, Brother, thanks to the kindness of our hosts.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000840_ALISAIE<tab>ええ、おかげさまで。
……迷惑をかけてしまって、ごめんなさい。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000850_ALISAIE<tab>They told me you had departed for Xelphatol while I was still abed. I slept much better knowing that. Thank you.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000850_ALISAIE<tab>あなたも……
先陣を切って、ゼルファトルに乗り込んでくれたと聞いたわ。
本当にありがとう……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000860_ALISAIE<tab>When they told me you had departed for Xelphatol, I found that I could rest. The outcome seemed a mere formality, as did your safe return. Thank you, my friend.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000860_ALISAIE<tab>あなたとも、こんな形で再会するなんて……。
先陣を切って、ゼルファトルに乗り込んでくれたと聞いたわ。
相変わらずなのね……本当にありがとう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000870_YSHTOLA<tab>I take it your mission was a success?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000870_YSHTOLA<tab>顛末は聞いてるわ。
そちらは、再召喚を止めることができたの……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000880_THANCRED<tab>...As if we needed any further confirmation that they are in league with the Ascians.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000880_THANCRED<tab>ふむ……。
闇の戦士たちが、アシエンと密会しているところは、
俺もアリゼー様とともに目撃している。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000890_THANCRED<tab>...But to <var 1A 02 /var>save another world<var 1A 01 /var>? I think not.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000890_THANCRED<tab>しかし、別の世界を救うために動いていたとは……
そんな話、信じられるのか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000900_ALPHINAUD<tab>I too thought his story fanciful at first. But it is possible there may be a kernel of truth in all of this. At the very least, none of his claims contradict the Word's account.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000900_ALPHINAUD<tab>「逆さの塔」で、星の代弁者として、
ミンフィリアが語ったこととも、相違はないように思える。
……まったくの嘘ではないだろう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000910_YSHTOLA<tab>You were following these people, Alisaie. Why?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000910_YSHTOLA<tab>アリゼー様は、どうして闇の戦士の追跡を？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000920_ALISAIE<tab>During my travels, I had oft enjoyed tales of the Scions and their exploits. But after a time, I began to hear whispers of a gifted, and theretofore unknown, band of adventurers.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000920_ALISAIE<tab>私は、私なりにエオルゼアを知るため、各地を旅していたの。
「暁」や英雄の話は、風の噂でよく聞いたわ……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000930_ALISAIE<tab>Adventurers who had supposedly sworn to travel the realm slaying primals in the Scions' stead.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000930_ALISAIE<tab>けれど最近、別の気になる噂を耳にしてね。
イシュガルド動乱の裏で、各地の蛮神を倒している、
別の英雄たちがいると……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000940_ALPHINAUD<tab>The Warriors of Darkness... And in the course of investigating these rumors, you stumbled upon the Ascians' involvement.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000940_ALPHINAUD<tab>それが、闇の戦士たちだったということか……。
そして噂を追っていった君は、
闇の戦士とアシエンの関係を知った。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000950_ALISAIE<tab>Yes. Exactly.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000950_ALISAIE<tab>……ええ、そのとおりよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000960_AYMERIC<tab>Forgive me, but if these Warriors of Darkness mean to bring about another Calamity, to what end do they hunt primals?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000960_AYMERIC<tab>しかし、彼らが霊災を引き起こすために動いているとして、
蛮神を召喚させ、あえて倒すという行為に、どんな意味が……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000970_ALISAIE<tab>To prompt an escalation. To deepen the beast tribes' feelings of helplessness and despair, and thereby drive them to summon ever more powerful gods.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000970_ALISAIE<tab>今、蛮神を続けざまに倒された各地の蛮族たちは、
警戒を強め、より強い状態で蛮神を召喚しようとしてるわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000980_ALISAIE<tab>And lest we forget, these events do not occur in isolation. With their patron deities being slain left and right, the news of man's victory over Nidhogg must surely have sown panic in the minds of the beastmen. 'Tis no wonder they wish to defend themselves.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000980_ALISAIE<tab>イシュガルドがニーズヘッグを討ったことも、
彼らにとっては、人への恐怖を煽る事実にすぎない……。
みんな、自分たちを守るために必死になってるのよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000990_AYMERIC<tab>Power answered with greater power, death with more death. A vicious cycle fueled by fear and hatred. I know its like all too well.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000990_AYMERIC<tab>力が力を渇望させる、恐怖と憎悪の連鎖……
「竜詩戦争」と同じだな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001000_ALISAIE<tab>Indeed. The Ascians sow discord and desperation, and the Warriors of Darkness reap the harvest. And so it continues.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001000_ALISAIE<tab>そう、それこそが連中の狙い。
アシエンが不安を焚きつけて蛮神召喚を促す一方で、
闇の戦士が、それを倒してまわる……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001010_ALISAIE<tab>Yet that is not the extent of their ambitions. The Ascian himself observed that once the powerless realize that the old gods have failed them, they will have little recourse but to look to a new one.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001010_ALISAIE<tab>力への渇望が連鎖して、
いずれ既存の神では太刀打ちできないと悟れば、
「新たな神」をも喚ぶだろうと、アシエンは言っていたわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001020_YSHTOLA<tab>...We cannot let that happen.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001020_YSHTOLA<tab>……見過ごせないわね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001030_THANCRED<tab>It should come as no surprise, but Alisaie and I have uncovered evidence that the Ascians have been manipulating certain parties to ensure that a constant stream of crystals flows into the hands of the beast tribes.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001030_THANCRED<tab>俺とアリゼー様の集めた情報によると、
蛮神召喚に必要なクリスタルは、
アシエンに誑かされた人間の手で、召喚者に提供されている。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001040_THANCRED<tab>If we sever these supply lines, we should at least be able to slow the escalation.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001040_THANCRED<tab>その経路を、暴いて叩けば……
加速する負の連鎖を、一時的にせよ止められる。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001050_YSHTOLA<tab>Agreed. Krile and I shall journey to Xelphatol and learn what we can of the Ixal's source.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001050_YSHTOLA<tab>それなら、私はクルルと一緒に、
ゼルファトルの追加調査に行ってくるわ。
私たちの力で追えば、新たな事実も見つかるかもしれない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001060_AYMERIC<tab>Hm. Then I, for my part, pledge to lead a similar investigation into the origin of the Gnath's supply.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001060_AYMERIC<tab>こちらも、最近召喚が行われたという、
グナースの塚付近を調査し、流通を洗おう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001070_ALPHINAUD<tab>Ser Aymeric?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001070_ALPHINAUD<tab>よいのですか、アイメリク卿……！？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001080_AYMERIC<tab>As a member of the Eorzean Alliance, Ishgard is honor-bound to play an active role in maintaining the security of the realm. You might also say that I have some personal motivation, given the Ascians' dealings with my father.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001080_AYMERIC<tab>アシエンとは、父の件で浅からぬ因縁があるからな。
……何より、今や我が国はエオルゼア同盟軍の一員なのだ。
この地に降りかかる脅威と、ともに戦う責務がある。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001090_AYMERIC<tab>However, I make no secret of the fact that my knowledge of primal beings is scant at best. As such, I should be most grateful if one of your order were to assist me.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001090_AYMERIC<tab>ただ……我々は、蛮神召喚に関する知識に乏しい。
可能であれば、賢人殿の知恵を借りたいのだが……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001100_THANCRED<tab>Allow me, Ser Aymeric. I have dealt with the Gnath before.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001100_THANCRED<tab>だったら、俺が付こう。
……よろしくお願いしますよ、アイメリク卿。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001110_ALPHINAUD<tab>Let us consult with Urianger, then. Given his dedication to the study of primal beings, I should be surprised if he could not tell us something of value.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001110_ALPHINAUD<tab>私たちも行こう。
蛮神召喚に関する動向を追っているウリエンジェを訪ねれば、
別の糸口もつかめるかもしれない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001120_ALISAIE<tab>Allow me to accompany you, Brother. And before you think to refuse, know that I am not the girl I once was. I shall not be a burden─you have my word.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001120_ALISAIE<tab>待って。
……私も連れていって。
もう体は動くし、絶対に足手纏いにはならないから。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001130_ALPHINAUD<tab>But Alisaie, you...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001130_ALPHINAUD<tab>アリゼー、君は…………。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001140_ALPHINAUD<tab>...You are more than welcome. After all, it was you who set us upon this path.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001140_ALPHINAUD<tab>……いや、ともに行こう。
それが、君の見つけた道ならば。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001150_TATARU<tab>Wait a minute! I'm afraid I can't allow you to leave just yet─not until you try on the new outfit I prepared for you!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001150_TATARU<tab>そのお言葉を、お待ちしておりまっした。
アリゼー様、お着替えの準備はバッチリでっす！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001160_ALISAIE<tab>Who goes there?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001160_ALISAIE<tab>……誰！？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001170_ALISAIE<tab>Oh, it's you. Forgive me for straying from the camp.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001170_ALISAIE<tab>……あなたか。
ごめんなさい、キャンプを勝手に抜け出して。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001180_ALISAIE<tab>He hasn't been feeling too welcome, to say the least. I thought a change of scenery might do him good, but, alas...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001180_ALISAIE<tab>この子が、ずっと冷えた視線にさらされてたから……
少しだけ気分転換しにきたのよ。
相変わらず、反応はないんだけれどね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001190_ALISAIE<tab>It's so quiet out here. The stars spread out before us, beckoning across time and space...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001190_ALISAIE<tab>静かね……。
星空に吸い込まれそう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001200_ALISAIE<tab>"Dawn may banish even the darkest night.“ How bitterly beautiful, those words.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001200_ALISAIE<tab>何かを失くした夜だって、
こうやって更けていって、やがて朝が来る。
……優しすぎて、いっそ薄情だわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001210_ALISAIE<tab>I should be stronger for all my experiences, yet my heart aches more than ever.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001210_ALISAIE<tab>エオルゼアに来て、旅をして……
なんだかね、力は強くなっているはずなのに、
胸が痛むことが増えたの。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001220_ALISAIE<tab>I never understood why Grandfather gave his life that day. I thought that, if I came here, I would find the answers I needed. But when I finally laid eyes on the land he sacrificed everything to save, saw firsthand the bickering, the pettiness...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001220_ALISAIE<tab>第七霊災の日、お祖父様は、命をかけてこの地を守った。
それに納得できる理由がほしくて追いかけてきたけど、
目にしたのは、膨大な問題と、翻弄されるばかりの人々……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001230_ALISAIE<tab>I was disappointed. I was <var 1A 02 /var>angry<var 1A 01 /var>. I could not fathom how these people were more deserving of his love than his family...than me...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001230_ALISAIE<tab>怒りもしたし……悲しかった。
お祖父様は、シャーレアンに残した私や家族よりも、
こんな人たちの方が大事だったのかってね……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001240_ALISAIE<tab>Nevertheless, I had to believe he had good reason. I was determined to uncover the whole truth of the Calamity, and perhaps in so doing find my own purpose in this sea of chaos.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001240_ALISAIE<tab>だけど、お祖父様が道を間違えるとも思えなかったから、
霊災の真実を探りながら、ずっと求め続けていたの。
エオルゼアの真価、守るべき理由を……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001250_ALISAIE<tab>But when Grandfather revealed the whole truth of the Calamity to us, I finally understood. And I resolved there and then to continue his legacy in my own way.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001250_ALISAIE<tab>あなたと霊災の真実を掴んで、それが違うと知ったわ。
だから今度は、お祖父様の真似ではない……
私がエオルゼアを守るべき理由を、探し続けてきたの。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001260_ALISAIE<tab>My travels have been enlightening, but I cannot say that I have enjoyed them. I have lost count of the many petty crises that I was helpless to resolve, and of the people whose actions I could not understand.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001260_ALISAIE<tab>たくさん歩いて、いろんなことに出会ったのよ？
興味を引くことや、嬉しいことだけじゃない。
理解できない人、腹が立つけどどうにもできなかった事件……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001270_ALISAIE<tab>There were others, of course. Good people. People with whom I felt a kinship...whose lives I could not save.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001270_ALISAIE<tab>やっとわかりあえたのに、
救えなかった命もあった…………。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001280_ALISAIE<tab>I found myself asking what it was all for. Why try if I was doomed to fail in the end? But then I recalled Grandfather's words to my father, years ago, before he left Sharlayan behind forever.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001280_ALISAIE<tab>そんなときにね、ふと昔の出来事を思い出したの。
霊災を止めるため、エオルゼアに向かうお祖父様が、
反対する父にいった言葉よ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001290_ALISAIE<tab>"To ignore the plight of those one might conceivably save is not wisdom─it is indolence. We must all protect that which we hold most dear in the manner of our own choosing.“
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001290_ALISAIE<tab>『助けられる人が目の前にいるときに、
我が身を案じて助けぬというのは怠惰というもの。
それでは到底、人として進歩的とはいえぬ』

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001300_ALISAIE<tab>...We have to try, do we not?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001300_ALISAIE<tab>ああ……って思ったわ。
私の求めてた答えなんて、きっとそれだけのことなのよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001310_ALISAIE<tab>Of course, it's one thing to try and another to do. There were times while I was tracking the Warriors of Darkness when I faltered─when I was afraid. But then I thought of my brother, of Urianger...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001310_ALISAIE<tab>そしたら急に、旅してきた道にいた、たくさんの人たち……
離れていたアルフィノや、ウリエンジェが恋しくなった。
闇の戦士をひとりで追っているときだって、怖くはなかったわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001320_ALISAIE<tab>Of course, it's one thing to try and another to do. There were times while I was tracking the Warriors of Darkness when I faltered─when I was afraid. But then I thought of my brother, of Urianger, of you...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001320_ALISAIE<tab>そしたら急に、旅してきた道にいた、たくさんの人たち……
アルフィノやウリエンジェ、あなたが恋しくなった。
闇の戦士をひとりで追っているときだって、怖くはなかったわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001330_ALISAIE<tab>Ah, pray forgive me. This conversation has been rather one-sided, hasn't it. Mayhap you could recount some of your adventures in Ishgard?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001330_ALISAIE<tab>私ばっかり話してて、なんだか恥ずかしいじゃない。
……ねえ、あなたの話も聞かせてよ。
イシュガルドでは、どんな旅をしたの？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_Q2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_Q2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>アリゼーに何を話す？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_A2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>I traveled far and wide with two companions, Estinien and Ysayle, who were very...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_A2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>エスティニアンやイゼルとの旅について

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_A2_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Under some rather unique circumstances, I had the pleasure to fight alongside Ser Aymeric...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_A2_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>アイメリクたちとともに戦ったこと

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_A2_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>When Alphinaud and I came at last to the Dravanian hinterlands...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_A2_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>アルフィノと低地ドラヴァニアを訪れたこと

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001340_ALISAIE<tab>Gods, they must have been at each other's throats from dawn till dusk...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001340_ALISAIE<tab>千年の歴史をたどる旅か……。
それにしても、ひどく個性的な仲間たちだったのね。
主義主張も違えば、性格もてんでバラバラ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001350_ALISAIE<tab>I daresay you managed to keep the peace, though. Merely being in the presence of the Warrior of Light is surely enough to shame <var 1A 02 /var>anyone<var 1A 01 /var> into behaving.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001350_ALISAIE<tab>一筋縄ではいかなくても、仲間割れをせずにいられたのは、
あなたの存在があったからじゃない？
信じたからこそ、あとを任せられたんだわ……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001360_ALISAIE<tab>He is quite a man, the lord commander. I shall have to thank him for his kindness. Truth be told, I was rather taken aback by it all. Given Ishgard's famous love of foreigners, I was half expecting the chirurgeons to berate me for bleeding.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001360_ALISAIE<tab>彼らには、私も助けられたわ。
今度あらためて、治療のお礼をしないとね。
排他的で知られた国とは思えないほど、手厚い対応だった。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001370_ALISAIE<tab>But I never heard an unkind word. Everyone there seemed relatively open and friendly, in fact─thanks in no small part to your tireless efforts, I suspect.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001370_ALISAIE<tab>それに、みんな前を向いているというか……
助け合うことを誇りに思っているような気がしたのよ。
……あれも、あなたの影響なのかしらね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001380_ALISAIE<tab>We had no clear memories of our life in the hinterlands, having returned to the motherland as infants. Nevertheless, I am quite familiar with Master Matoya, as is every Sharlayan. I should like to speak with her someday.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001380_ALISAIE<tab>シャーレアンが低地ドラヴァニアから「大撤収」したのは、
私がまだ赤ん坊のころだから……記憶にはないんだけどね。
その「マトーヤ様」とは、話をしてみたいものだわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001390_ALISAIE<tab>'Twould not surprise me if Alphinaud's recent maturation was at least somewhat due to her sage guidance. I would never tell him this, of course, but there have been moments when I've caught myself thinking of him as an <var 1A 02 /var>elder brother<var 1A 01 /var>...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001390_ALISAIE<tab>それにしても、アルフィノはずいぶん経験を積んだのね。
私のことを「変わった」なんていってたけれど、
あっちの変わりようの方が驚きよ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001400_ALISAIE<tab>The hopes and dreams of so many rest on your shoulders, Warrior of Light.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001400_ALISAIE<tab>あなた、多くの人に関わって、
いろいろな想いを託されながら歩いてきたのね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001410_ALISAIE<tab>As long as the sun rises, we can but carry on. For the sake of those we hold dear.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001410_ALISAIE<tab>……そして、きっとこれからも。
世界が明日を運んでくる限り、
託されたものを携えて進むんだわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001420_URIANGER<tab>To what end dost thou cling to the tainted gifts of the Mother?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001420_URIANGER<tab>……光のクリスタル。
光を憎んでなお、捨てることはできませんか……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001430_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Every tool has its purpose. Even this.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001430_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>フン……。
俺たちの目的を達するために必要なだけだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001440_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Well, what is it?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001440_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>……それで、何の用だ？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001450_URIANGER<tab>The seeds sown in Vylbrand have been plucked from the earth and left to wither.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001450_URIANGER<tab>ラノシアに撒いた種……
蛮神「タイタン」召喚の芽が、
かの英雄らによって、摘み取られました……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001460_URIANGER<tab>Alas, Titan's demise sufficed not to drive the kobolds to deepest desperation.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001460_URIANGER<tab>正確には、召喚こそ行われたものの、不完全だった……。
あれでは、更なる力……神への渇望を煽るには、不十分です。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001470_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>What did the man in white have to say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001470_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>白法衣の野郎は何と？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001480_URIANGER<tab>That we are to proceed as he did first set forth.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001480_URIANGER<tab>計画は続行……それだけです……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001490_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Well that's easy for him to say! It's not <var 1A 02 /var>his<var 1A 01 /var> bloody world on the brink of destruction, is it!?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001490_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>クソッ、悠長なことを……！
第一世界が無に帰されるまで、時間がないんだぞ……！？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001500_URIANGER<tab>Be thou well reminded that with an end to Ishgard's unrest, naught now remaineth to preoccupy the Scions' thoughts. And thus may they devote their every energy to thwarting thee and thine. I foresee only greater difficulties ahead.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001500_URIANGER<tab>イシュガルドの平定に手を貸していた「暁」が、
本格的に、あなたがたの対応に乗り出した……。
然れば……計画のさらなる難航は必定……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001510_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Foresee? Are you sure you don't <var 1A 02 /var>welcome them<var 1A 01 /var>? I'm starting to think you might hold a candle for your old friends, after all...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001510_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>ハッ、古巣のことだからわかるって？
過去の光を捨てられないのは、どっちだかな……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001520_URIANGER<tab>Pray do not mistake mine intent. I but look upon the path which lieth before us with due trepidation.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001520_URIANGER<tab>……勘違いをなさらぬよう。
私は、あなたの今後を問うているのです……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001530_URIANGER<tab>Shouldst thou be of like mind, pray consider, then, another course, for the power to invoke the Ardor belongeth not unto the Ascians alone.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001530_URIANGER<tab>地にあまねく混沌をもたらし、崩壊の先駆けとならんは、
闇よりいずる者のみにあらず……。
お気に召さないのであれば、ご自分の考えで動けばいい……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001540_URIANGER<tab>With thine own hand, strike down thine enemy─the so-called hero who would see thy home lost to Light. Do but this and thou wouldst, at a single stroke, disrupt the all too delicate balance of this realm, plunging her straightways into chaos.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001540_URIANGER<tab>たとえば、その手で、かの英雄を葬り去れば……
危うい均衡を保っているエオルゼアの地は乱れ、
破滅へと転落せん……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001550_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>You do realize what you're suggesting, yes?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001550_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>お前、何を考えてやがる。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001560_URIANGER<tab>"To ignore the plight of those one might conceivably save is not wisdom─it is indolence.“ The words of my teacher, and a creed I hold close to my heart.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001560_URIANGER<tab>助けられる者が目の前にいるとき、
助けぬことは怠惰である。
……我が師の言葉であり、私の理念です。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001570_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Very well. Draw <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var> out. We'll make it quick.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001570_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>あの甘ッタレどもをおびき出せ。
一気にカタをつけてやる。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001580_URIANGER<tab>It shall be done.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001580_URIANGER<tab>承知いたしました……。
それでは、「彼ら」を使うといたしましょう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001590_URIANGER<tab>What good a creed one cannot uphold? What hurts soothed, what lives saved... O hapless fool, what hast thou wrought by thine own hands?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001590_URIANGER<tab>師の言葉は、今も変わらず胸にあれど……
この手に、ひとつの痛みもなく、すべてを救う強さはない……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001600_URIANGER<tab>Minfilia, my friends─I shall not now beg your forgiveness.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001600_URIANGER<tab>ミンフィリア……皆さん……
許せなどとは申しません。
それでも、私は……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001610_URIANGER<tab>Full deeply though it paineth me to walk it, I shall not stray from my chosen path. As Moenbryda remained steadfast, so too shall I...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001610_URIANGER<tab>踏み出すたびに、心裂けようとも……
信じた道なら、あなたは進むのでしょうか。
ムーンブリダ……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001620_IRONMASK<tab>Brothers and sisters... Twenty years ago, Ala Mhigo, our home, was claimed by the Garlean Empire.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001620_IRONMASK<tab>知ってのとおり……
20年前、我らが故郷「アラミゴ」は、
鉄の侵略者「ガレマール帝国」に占拠された。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001630_IRONMASK<tab>In our haste to overthrow the King of Ruin, we turned a blind eye to our foes in the north. With our glorious revolution, we but laid a path for a new tyrant to succeed the old...and when confronted with our failure, we fled.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001630_IRONMASK<tab>きっかけは、長く圧政でアラミゴを苦しめていた、
暴君テオドリックを排するための内乱……
その直後の混乱を狙っての、非情な蹂躙だった。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001640_IRONMASK<tab>Not a day goes by that I do not think of those we left behind─think of them, and feel ashamed. And I know each and every one of you feels the same.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001640_IRONMASK<tab>しかし、君も……ここにいる誰もが、
かつてアラミゴが領したギラバニアの地を、
残してきた同胞を、忘れた日はないだろう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001650_IRONMASK<tab>We abandoned them, our own flesh and blood, to labor till their backs gave in and their breath gave out, building the twisted steel ramparts which now mar our once majestic mountains.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001650_IRONMASK<tab>かの地の惨状を、想像してほしい。
雄大な山々の間に、同胞の命を捧げて築かれた鉄の砦が並び、
豪然とした大地は、乾くままに同胞の血を吸っている。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001660_IRONMASK<tab>We abandoned them, the brave and true, to fight and die for their country─or worse, to be conscripted and sent off to rob another poor bastard of his home.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001660_IRONMASK<tab>残された国民のうち、力と誇りを持つ者は惨たらしく殺された。
力のみを持つ者は、武器を握らされ、
帝国の雑兵として異郷に送られて、そこで死ぬ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001670_IRONMASK<tab>We abandoned them, the meek and powerless, to bow and scrape when the Garleans pass─to sully themselves that they might live to see another day of misery.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001670_IRONMASK<tab>力すらも持たざる者は、みじめにも侵略者に道の中央を譲り、
あらゆる尊厳を奪われながら生きている……ッ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001680_IRONMASK<tab>The Black Wolf may be dead, but a new imperial viceroy reigns in Ala Mhigo now. A beast not a fraction as merciful.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001680_IRONMASK<tab>憎き総督、ガイウス・ヴァン・バエサル亡きあと、
件の「新総督」が赴任して以来、弾圧は加速している。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001690_IRONMASK<tab>You all know the Eorzean Alliance will do naught to oppose him. For all their promises and platitudes, they will not act if there's no profit in it. Only <var 1A 02 /var>we<var 1A 01 /var> can free our brothers and sisters from the Empire's tyranny, my friends! Only we have the courage to stand and fight!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001690_IRONMASK<tab>もはや、エオルゼア諸国の助けを待つ時間はない。
奴らは口約束を重ねるが、利のない戦いと踏んで、
決して動きはしないのだ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001700_IRONMASK<tab>They have imprisoned us, they have enslaved us, and they have murdered us─but no more! Blood demands blood, and the Garleans shall pay for every drop they have spilt upon our lands!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001700_IRONMASK<tab>地獄と成り果てた故郷で、今なお再起を待つ友のため、
我々はすぐに立ち上がらねばならない。
今度こそ、革命を成すという覚悟を持って！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001710_IRONMASK<tab>This I promise you, for we have a power within us, my friends─a power befitting our pride, our righteousness! Only join us, and we shall grant you the means to unleash it, and together we shall see the Ala Mhigan standard raised over the mountains of Gyr Abania once more!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001710_IRONMASK<tab>さあ、私とともに来る者は声を上げよ！
その誇りにふさわしい力を与える準備が、我々にはある。
ギラバニアの山並に、故国の旗を再び仰ぎ見ようではないか！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001720_ALPHINAUD<tab>"A power befitting their pride...“ Not at all ominous, that.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001720_ALPHINAUD<tab>誇りにふさわしい力、か……。
いよいよ疑念がぬぐえないな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001730_ALPHINAUD<tab>Wait. Is that─?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001730_ALPHINAUD<tab>……おや？
あのふたりは…………

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001740_YDA<tab><gasp> What are you two doing here!?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001740_YDA<tab>ウソでしょ……！
ふたりとも、どうしてここに……！？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001750_ALPHINAUD<tab>I could ask you the same thing!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001750_ALPHINAUD<tab>イダ、パパリモ！？
無事だったのか……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001760_PAPALYMO<tab>Well, well, this is quite the surprise.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001760_PAPALYMO<tab>驚いた、まさかこんなところで会うなんてね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001770_PAPALYMO<tab>Might I suggest we continue this conversation in more...<var 1A 02 /var>agreeable<var 1A 01 /var> surroundings?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001770_PAPALYMO<tab>……再会にひたるには、場所が悪い。
とりあえず、ここを離れよう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001780_IRONMASK<tab>If you see what I see, if you feel as I feel, then I bid you join us! And those of you who cannot fight, fear not. For it is not strength of arms that will win this battle, but strength of heart!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001780_IRONMASK<tab>賛同する者は、部下とともに、我らのキャンプへ！
気高き志を持つ同志たちが、君の参戦を待ちわびている。
戦う力のない者にも、重要な役割がある。
君たちの力を貸してほしい！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001790_IRONMASK<tab>My thanks, comrades.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001790_IRONMASK<tab>案内ご苦労……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001800_IRONMASK<tab>You must be the esteemed adventurers of whom I have heard so much. I understand you have taken an interest in our cause.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001800_IRONMASK<tab>アラミゴ解放運動に関心を持つ勇士がいると聞いた。
君たちのことで、間違いないな？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001810_ALPHINAUD<tab>A <var 1A 02 /var>great<var 1A 01 /var> interest, you might say.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001810_ALPHINAUD<tab>ええ……。
あなた方の活動に、大変興味があるのです。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001820_ALPHINAUD<tab>Your words have certainly made quite an impression on my friend and I. The Resistance has long─and some would say wisely─avoided open engagements with the Garleans, but you and yours seem confident against the world in arms.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001820_ALPHINAUD<tab>アラミゴ解放軍は、武器も数も帝国軍に劣っている。
だからこそ、仲間を失うだけの、無謀な戦いは避けてきた。
……しかし、鉄仮面殿の主張は異なるようだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001830_ALPHINAUD<tab>I can only assume you have good reason to be so bold. Why, one might even think you were planning to summon a primal.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001830_ALPHINAUD<tab>単刀直入に伺いましょう。
あなた方は、アラミゴ解放のために、
蛮神の力を使うつもりではありませんか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001840_ALPHINAUD<tab>Because that would do much to explain the sizable shipment of crystals you recently received from your smuggler friends─whom our Ishgardian allies have since detained, lest you wonder.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001840_ALPHINAUD<tab>そのために、イシュガルドの密輸犯から、
大量のクリスタルを受け取った……。
我々の仲間が、すでにその密輸犯を捕まえています。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001850_YDA<tab>I'd like to hear more about the Griffin. The <var 1A 02 /var>real<var 1A 01 /var> Griffin. Your performance earlier didn't fool us!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001850_YDA<tab>正直に答えてよね。
そっちが影武者だってことも、わかってるんだから！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001860_IRONMASK<tab>Ah. The famous Scions of the Seventh Dawn. I should have known better than to think I could conceal the truth from you lot.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001860_IRONMASK<tab>……なるほど。
噂に聞く、「暁」の者だな。
であれば、隠しとおせはしないか……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001870_IRONMASK<tab>(-The False Griffin-)You are right. I am not the Griffin. But I speak with his voice, and it was at his behest that we procured those crystals.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001870_IRONMASK<tab>(-鉄仮面の影武者-)確かに、私は、鉄仮面卿の影武者だ。
そして「本物」の指示を受け、
この地でクリスタルを受け取った。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001880_IRONMASK<tab>(-The False Griffin-)You are wrong, however, if you think that we procured them to summon a primal.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001880_IRONMASK<tab>(-鉄仮面の影武者-)しかし、その目的は、
我々自身が蛮神を召喚するためではない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001890_IRONMASK<tab>(-The False Griffin-)We used them to reach an accord with the Amalj'aa. In exchange for crystals to summon their god, they will aid us in the fight for Ala Mhigan liberation.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001890_IRONMASK<tab>(-鉄仮面の影武者-)……アマルジャ族と、取引をしたのだよ。
彼らが蛮神召喚のために欲しているクリスタルを与え、
代わりに、アラミゴ解放のための傭兵を借りる契約だ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001900_YDA<tab>You've got to be joking! Have you gone completely mad!?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001900_YDA<tab>自分たちがよければ、蛮神が召喚されても構わないってこと！？
メチャクチャだよ……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001910_YDA<tab>When people find out you helped the lizardmen summon Ifrit, they'll turn on the Resistance! Ala Mhigo will never be free!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001910_YDA<tab>そんな風に、ほかの地域を傷つけながら革命を遂げたって、
傷つけた誰かから報復を受けるだけ。
それじゃ、いつまでたっても、アラミゴは解放されない！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001920_IRONMASK<tab>(-The False Griffin-)This isn't a faerie tale, girl. We don't have the luxury to play at being honorable heroes.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001920_IRONMASK<tab>(-鉄仮面の影武者-)まるで綺麗ごとだな……。
そうやって怖気づくから、いつまでも解放ごっこのままなのだ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001930_IRONMASK<tab>(-The False Griffin-)It's because the likes of you wouldn't sully your saintly hands that Ala Mhigo's been under the yoke for the past twenty years! But the Griffin won't stand for it, and neither will we! We're ready to do whatever it takes!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001930_IRONMASK<tab>(-鉄仮面の影武者-)暴挙のひとつも犯す覚悟なしに、
20年成し得なかった故国奪還など不可能ッ！
鉄仮面卿こそ、真に戦う覚悟をなさった革命者だ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001940_PAPALYMO<tab>What proof do you have of this arrangement with the Amalj'aa?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001940_PAPALYMO<tab>……クリスタルの行方について、君たちの言葉を信じる根拠は？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001950_IRONMASK<tab>(-The False Griffin-)What, aside from a lack of crystals? None. But the beastmen have a great big pile of the things, if you fancy looking. You might want to hurry, though─it'll not be long before they summon their god.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001950_IRONMASK<tab>(-鉄仮面の影武者-)アマルジャ族の砦に乗り込んでもらうしかないな。
運が良ければ、神が降ろされる前に回収できるだろう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001960_IRONMASK<tab>(-The False Griffin-)Search our camp if you don't believe me. We have naught to hide.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001960_IRONMASK<tab>(-鉄仮面の影武者-)私たちが隠し持っていることを疑うのなら、
こちらでの拠点にしているキャンプまで同行し、
調べてもらってもかまわない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001970_PAPALYMO<tab>If there is a cache to be found, Yda and I will find it.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001970_PAPALYMO<tab>アラミゴ解放軍については、少なからず知識がある。
僕とイダで、キャンプを調べにいってもいいかな？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001980_IRONMASK<tab>(-The False Griffin-)Then let us be off.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001980_IRONMASK<tab>(-鉄仮面の影武者-)では、彼らをキャンプに案内しよう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001990_IRONMASK<tab>(-The False Griffin-)Are you perchance the Warrior of Light?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001990_IRONMASK<tab>(-鉄仮面の影武者-)……もしや、あなたが「暁」の英雄殿か？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002000_IRONMASK<tab>(-The False Griffin-)Aye, I thought so. You should know that a great many who have joined us did so because you saved them─because you showed them that one brave <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var> can make a difference.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002000_IRONMASK<tab>(-鉄仮面の影武者-)ああ……そうなのだな…………。
鉄仮面卿のもとには、かつてあなたに救われ、
雄姿に勇気づけられて、聖戦に身を投じた者も少なくない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002010_IRONMASK<tab>(-The False Griffin-)You saved me too, once. Helped a friend over in Quarrymill make some medicine I needed. But that was a lifetime ago...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002010_IRONMASK<tab>(-鉄仮面の影武者-)かく言う私も、黒衣森のクォーリーミルで、
あなたのもたらした薬によって救われたアラミゴ人のひとり。
……あなたは、きっと覚えていないだろうが。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002020_IRONMASK<tab>(-The False Griffin-)On behalf of my brothers and sisters, I thank you. You gave us hope where there was none; courage and strength when all was lost. We shall not squander your gift.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002020_IRONMASK<tab>(-鉄仮面の影武者-)多くのアラミゴ難民に代わり、改めて感謝しよう。
挫けた者を導いた、あなたはまさしく英雄だ。
どうか、私たちの戦いを見守ってほしい。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002030_PAPALYMO<tab>I know that look, Yda, and I do not like it. You cannot seriously be contemplating taking up arms with that band of cutthroats?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002030_PAPALYMO<tab>いつまですねてるつもりだよ。
……言い返せなくて悔しいなら、あいつらに代わって、
君が解放運動の前線に立つかい？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002040_YDA<tab>I... I just...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002040_YDA<tab>それは…………。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002050_PAPALYMO<tab>If the Griffin and his men have their way, it is only a matter of time before the situation in Ala Mhigo comes to a head.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002050_PAPALYMO<tab>どうあれ、鉄仮面たちの動きは、
長年停滞してきたアラミゴ問題に、流れを生じさせている。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002060_PAPALYMO<tab>Your homeland's future teeters on a knife-edge, and any reckless action, however small, could have irrevocable consequences.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002060_PAPALYMO<tab>その先端たる今このときの行動は、
波紋を描き、やがて大局を左右するだろう……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002070_PAPALYMO<tab>You mustn't lose sight of that, Yda. When the time comes, we must all make our choices, but we must do so in full possession of the facts. Now let us away─there is work to be done.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002070_PAPALYMO<tab>そろそろ、君自身の決断と向き合えよ。
……相棒からの助言は、それだけだ。
行くぞ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002080_THANCRED<tab>This isn't right. The Amalj'aa would never leave this place so poorly guarded.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002080_THANCRED<tab>……妙だな。
祭壇近くだってのに、警備が薄すぎる。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002090_ALISAIE<tab>Not willingly, no.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002090_ALISAIE<tab>どうやら、アマルジャ族の怠慢ってわけじゃないみたい。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002100_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Hah hah! Ahhh, the saviors of Eorzea. Slow as ever.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002100_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>よぉ……。
相変わらず遅すぎだぜ、甘ッタレども。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002110_ALPHINAUD<tab>By the Twelve... Will you never learn?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002110_ALPHINAUD<tab>これは、君たちがやったのか……。
しかし、なぜ……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002120_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>You know, you're right. Mayhap it <var 1A 02 /var>is<var 1A 01 /var> time for a change of tack. Killing primals, tormenting beastmen, hastening the birth of a new god...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002120_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>アシエンの野郎は、相も変わらず、
蛮神討伐によって蛮族どもを絶望させ、
「新たな神」を喚ばせようとしてるんだがな……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002130_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>It's all a bit much, isn't it? And, frankly, we don't have the leisure to do it.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002130_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>俺たちはやめたんだ、そういう面倒なやり方は。
なにせ、時間がないもんでな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002140_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Killing the Warrior of Light, on the other hand─that would <var 1A 02 /var>soon<var 1A 01 /var> plunge Eorzea into chaos.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002140_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>この世界の「光の戦士」たるお前さえ殺せば、
エオルゼア中を、一気に混乱に叩き落せる。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002150_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>One life for one world. A fair exchange─wouldn't you agree!?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002150_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>第一世界のすべての命のために……
死んでもらうッ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002160_THANCRED<tab>Lest you forget, you've more than one opponent!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002160_THANCRED<tab>おいおい、お前らにリベンジしたいのは、
あいつだけじゃないんだぜ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002170_ALPHINAUD<tab>Carbuncle, defend me!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002170_ALPHINAUD<tab>させるかッ！
カーバンクル・オブシダン！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002180_BARDOFDARKNESS<tab>I sense you will offer more than mere target practice. Unlike your sister.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002180_BARDOFDARKNESS<tab>あーあ、今度こそ仕留めてあげようと思ったのに。
でも、あっちの子はどうかな？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002190_ALPHINAUD<tab>Alisaie!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002190_ALPHINAUD<tab>アリゼーッ！！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002200_ALISAIE<tab>Did...did I not tell you, Alphinaud? I am not the girl I once was.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002200_ALISAIE<tab>問題……ないわ……。
絶対に、足手纏いにならないって……
約束したじゃない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002210_ALISAIE<tab>My brother was always the clever one, while my talents lay elsewhere...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002210_ALISAIE<tab>悪いわね……！
私、デキのいい兄と違って、頭より先に体が動くの。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002220_ALISAIE<tab>If you would dare to stand against us, to destroy all that we hold dear, then you shall die by my sword!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002220_ALISAIE<tab>旅の中で会得した、とっておきよ。
お前が世界を引き裂くなら、
私は、それを斬り裂く剣になるッ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002230_ALISAIE<tab>As Eorzea's blade of Light once stood by my side, now I shall stand at <var 08 E905 ((hers)) ((his)) /var>─and defend this realm with all my might!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002230_ALISAIE<tab>旅の中で会得した、とっておきよ。
かつて、私を真実へと導いてくれた人のように……
今度は私が、エオルゼアの剣になるッ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002240_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Let's finish this!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002240_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>来いッ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002250_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>It ends, now!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002250_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>さあ……
そろそろ終わりだぜ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002260_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>What!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002260_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>くッ……！？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002270_ALPHINAUD<tab>The chains!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002270_ALPHINAUD<tab>これは……拘束が解けた……！？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002280_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>You <var 1A 02 /var>snake<var 1A 01 /var>. You would betray us as well?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002280_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>……どういうつもりだ。
俺たちまで裏切るのか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002290_URIANGER<tab>He that holdeth fast unto his convictions shall never count betrayal amongst his crimes, though all the world may call him villain. My path is unchanged; my creed sacrosanct. This I believe with all my heart.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002290_URIANGER<tab>私なりの手法に沿うだけです……。
そもそも、裏切りとは、信じたものを破ればこそ……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002300_URIANGER<tab>But say, Warrior of Darkness, and speak true─what dost <var 1A 02 /var>thou<var 1A 01 /var> believe? That rendering up the souls of thy world in service to the Rejoining will grant it salvation? Nay.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002300_URIANGER<tab>第一世界に住まえる者の魂を、
この原初世界に送ることが、本当の救いであると……
あなた方は、心から信じておいでですか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002310_ALPHINAUD<tab>By the Twelve─Urianger!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002310_ALPHINAUD<tab>その声……！
まさか、ウリエンジェなのか！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002320_URIANGER<tab>Mine apologies, Master Alphinaud. That the brightest light might shine, duty did compel me to walk in darkest shade.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002320_URIANGER<tab>申し訳ありません……。
己が役目を果たすため、しばし、闇に紛れておりました……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002330_ALISAIE<tab>You sweet fool. I was almost willing to believe you had turned against us.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002330_ALISAIE<tab>馬鹿……。
ちょっとだけ、本気で裏切ったんじゃないかって、
心配したじゃない……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002340_ALISAIE<tab>I expect a full explanation when this is over. For now, may I assume you have turned your cloak for the last time?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002340_ALISAIE<tab>弁解は、あとでたっぷり聞かせてもらうわ。
今のあなたは味方……それでいいのよね？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002350_URIANGER<tab>Thou mayest, my lady.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002350_URIANGER<tab>ええ、無論です。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002360_URIANGER<tab>By thy leave.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002360_URIANGER<tab>……何なりとご命令を。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002370_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Even odds, then. No matter. We'll crush the lot of you in one fell swoop!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002370_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>数は互角、か。
上等だ……まとめて蹴散らしてやる。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002380_BLACKMAGEOFDARKNESS<tab>Understood.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002380_BLACKMAGEOFDARKNESS<tab>……了解した。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002390_ALISAIE<tab>Hearken to me! We only have one chance!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002390_ALISAIE<tab>あいつら、大技を仕掛けてくるみたい。
だったら、ひとつ提案があるの。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002400_ALISAIE<tab>Channel your aether into my blade that I might strike before the mage casts his spell!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002400_ALISAIE<tab>あなたたちの力を、私に貸して。
あっちの技が発動する前に、みんなのエーテルを剣に集め、
光の刃として一気に放つのよ……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002410_ALISAIE<tab>I cannot do it alone, but together...together we can defeat them!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002410_ALISAIE<tab>私ひとりじゃ、刃の威力も、構築するための時間も、
圧倒的に足りないけれど……
ひとりぼっちじゃないなら、勝てない賭けじゃないわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002420_ALISAIE<tab>Make ready! They come!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002420_ALISAIE<tab>行くわよ……ッ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002430_ALPHINAUD<tab>Alisaie! Are you hurt?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002430_ALPHINAUD<tab>アリゼー！
大丈夫か……！？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002440_ALISAIE<tab>A touch dizzy, but otherwise fine. Thank you.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002440_ALISAIE<tab>からっからだけど……大丈夫……。
みんなのおかげでね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002450_THANCRED<tab>And there you have it. Our friend is too stubborn to die.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002450_THANCRED<tab>……勝敗は決した。
お前たちに、こいつは殺せない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002460_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Hmph. We are far from finished.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002460_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>さて、そいつはどうかな……。
俺たちも、まだ終わるわけにはいかないんでね……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002470_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Or have you never considered how we came to this world?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002470_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>俺たちが……どうやって境界を越え、
この原初世界に来たか、考えたことはあるか……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002480_THANCRED<tab>Crystals? You mean...like the <var 1A 02 /var>Ascians<var 1A 01 /var>?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002480_THANCRED<tab>クリスタル……！？
まさか、アシエンの不死と同じ……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002490_URIANGER<tab>Just so. As the Ascians flee unto the rift 'twixt planes with Crystals of Darkness, so did these warriors come hither with Crystals of Light.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002490_URIANGER<tab>そのとおり……アシエンが、闇のクリスタルによって、
己の魂を「次元の狭間」に送り、死をまぬがれるように……
彼らは、光のクリスタルをもって、魂を越境させる……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002500_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Eloquent, as always. Aye, like the Ascians, we too are beyond death! You cannot defeat that which is eternal!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002500_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>ハッ、ご丁寧な解説ありがとうよ……。
つまり俺たちも、アシエンと同じように不死になれる。
……この敗北は、終わりじゃない！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002510_THANCRED<tab>Hmph!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002510_THANCRED<tab>チッ……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002520_ALPHINAUD<tab>Wait!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002520_ALPHINAUD<tab>待ってくれ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002530_ALPHINAUD<tab>Such methods as the Ascians employ require the renunciation of the flesh. You...you would have had to...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002530_ALPHINAUD<tab>その方法を使うには、元の世界で、
魂の器である肉体の死を迎えなければならないはず。
ならば、君たちは……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002540_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>At long last, you see. To save our world, we gave our lives.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002540_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>……そうだ。
俺たちは、俺たちの世界を救うため……自ら命を絶った。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002550_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>We were just adventurers trying to make our way. An odd job here, a favor there─we never aspired to be Warriors of Light.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002550_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>「光の戦士」なんて肩書を背負ってたからじゃねぇ。
最初はただ、旅の中で出会った奴に、
手を貸しただけだったんだ……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002560_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>But word of our deeds spread, and soon people were calling us heroes. They placed their hopes and dreams on our shoulders and bid us fight for all that was good and right.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002560_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>そんな因縁がいつの間にか広まって、俺たちは英雄と呼ばれた。
……多くの想いに背中を押され、戦い続けた。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002570_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>We fought and we fought and we fought...until there was no one left to fight. We <var 1A 02 /var>won<var 1A 01 /var>...and now our world is being erased from existence.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002570_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>ところがどうだ、俺たちが勝ったがゆえに、
世界は「光の氾濫」で無に帰るときやがった……ッ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002580_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>We did <var 1A 02 /var>everything<var 1A 01 /var> right, everything that was asked of us, and still─<var 1A 02 /var>still<var 1A 01 /var> it came to this!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002580_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>なんでだよ……。
そんな結末のために、俺たちは歩んできたんじゃない……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002590_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>You of all people should understand! We cannot─we <var 1A 02 /var>will<var 1A 01 /var> not falter. We brought our world to the brink of destruction, and now we must save it.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002590_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>なあ、お前ならわかるだろ……わかれよッ！
世界をあんな風にしちまった俺たちは……
俺たちだけは、何があっても諦めちゃならないんだ……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002600_PALADINOFDARKNESS<tab>I've died before, Arbert. I'm not afraid to die again.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002600_PALADINOFDARKNESS<tab>そうだよなァ……アルバート……。
この程度の痛み、死んだときに比べたら、なんてことはねぇ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002610_WHITEMAGEOFDARKNESS<tab>No matter how many times we fall, we must rise and carry on the fight. For those we left behind.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002610_WHITEMAGEOFDARKNESS<tab>何度でも、戦いましょう。
はるかなる故郷の仲間に……せめてもの救いが訪れるように。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002620_URIANGER<tab>To have known the depths of sorrow and embrace the highest sacrifice─nonetheless...Master Louisoix, guide my hand, I pray you, as fate's thread spinneth upon this most capricious spindle.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002620_URIANGER<tab>これほどの嘆きに、なお多くの犠牲を重ねるなど、
我が師であれば……いえ、私自身が認めない。
今、万事の糸を縒り、新たな道を紡ぎましょう……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002630_URIANGER<tab>Quickly! Thou must needs invoke the power of thy crystal!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002630_URIANGER<tab>あなたの、光のクリスタルを掲げてください！
さあ、早く……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002640_ALPHINAUD<tab>What is this place?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002640_ALPHINAUD<tab>ここは……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002650_MINFILIA<tab>Such pain... Such sorrow... Oh, my dear children...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002650_MINFILIA<tab>嘆きが聞こえる……
愛しい子らの……悲しい嘆きが……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002660_THANCRED<tab>I-It can't be!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002660_THANCRED<tab>この声、まさか……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002670_URIANGER<tab>Mother Hydaelyn, hearken unto Your children's plea! From two worlds do we gather, and from two worlds do we offer a bounty of Light.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002670_URIANGER<tab>ハイデリンよ……！
ふたつの世界の光のクリスタルをもって、
あなたに力を返しました……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002680_URIANGER<tab>In this desperate hour, we do beseech Your intercession! We beg an audience with the Word of the Mother─with Your chosen, Minfilia!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002680_URIANGER<tab>今ならば、できることがあるはずです。
あなたの使徒を……
ミンフィリアを、解き放ちなさい！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002690_MINFILIA<tab>Your cries go not unheard... Nor your sacrifices unnoticed...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002690_MINFILIA<tab>そう わたしは聞いた……
哀しい決意……心裂く嘆きを……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002700_MINFILIA<tab>Though many are lost, there are those we can yet save... Whom I can yet save...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002700_MINFILIA<tab>わたしたちは 救いたい
「わたし」は 今度こそみんなを救いたい――

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002710_ALPHINAUD<tab>Minfilia!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002710_ALPHINAUD<tab>ミンフィリア……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002720_MINFILIA<tab>Blessed children of the First. The light of your world hath grown blinding in its radiance, but it is not yet absolute.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002720_MINFILIA<tab>(-ミンフィリア-)第一世界の、光の加護を受けし者たちよ。
わたしは、ハイデリンの使徒……
いわば、光の調停者です。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002730_MINFILIA<tab>I will hie me to your world and there take unto myself the Light which riseth even now to drown it, as Darkness once did drown another.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002730_MINFILIA<tab>(-ミンフィリア-)わたしが第一世界に渡り、強まりすぎた光を正しましょう。
「光の氾濫」も、避けることができるはずです。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002740_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab><var 1A 02 /var>Now<var 1A 01 /var> you deign to answer our prayers!? I will suffer this farce no longer!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002740_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>戯言を……いまさら信じられるか！
ハイデリンなど……
俺たちの祈りにも、応えてこなかったくせにッ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002750_MINFILIA<tab>(-Minfilia-)As the Ascians must serve as instruments of Zodiark's will, so too must others carry out the will of Hydaelyn.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002750_MINFILIA<tab>(-ミンフィリア-)ごめんなさい……。
ゾディアークがアシエンを介さなければ干渉できないように、
ハイデリンも、直接「光の氾濫」を止めることはできないの。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002760_MINFILIA<tab>(-Minfilia-)But for the boon you have granted Her, She has grown strong enough to set me free, that I might serve as Her emissary.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002760_MINFILIA<tab>(-ミンフィリア-)だけど、あなたたちが弱り切ったハイデリンに力をくれて、
その一部となっていたわたしが、
こうして使徒として切り離された……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002770_MINFILIA<tab>(-Minfilia-)Your suffering, your sacrifice, your supplications─She has heard all. We will not let the First fall to Light.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002770_MINFILIA<tab>(-ミンフィリア-)あなたの嘆きも、祈りも、ハイデリンとして聞いていたわ。
大丈夫……第一世界は、決して滅ぼさせない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002780_MINFILIA<tab>(-Minfilia-)Thank you, Urianger, for bringing everyone here. It fills my heart with joy to look upon the faces of my friends once more.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002780_MINFILIA<tab>(-ミンフィリア-)ウリエンジェさん……
ここまでみんなを導いてくれて、ありがとうございました。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002790_URIANGER<tab>In taking you unto Her bosom, I knew that Hydaelyn had bequeathed to you a sliver of Her grace, granting you strength long sought.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002790_URIANGER<tab>……あなたについての報告を聞いたとき、察しました。
星の一部となることは、星の力を得るのと同義……
戦えない己を嘆いていたあなたが、ついに力を手にしたのだと。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002800_URIANGER<tab>And in treating with the Ascians, I learned of a star like unto our own─a doomed world of fallen heroes, in whom I glimpsed ourselves. The First.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002800_URIANGER<tab>私は、アシエンと接触した際に、第一世界の事情を知った……。
そして、深い悲しみを抱えた彼らを……
我々の未来の姿かも知れぬ彼らを、救いたいと思ったのです。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002810_URIANGER<tab>Full long did I search for a means to save this world, concluding at the last that the answer lay in the power of blessed crystals. And thus did I labor to set Light against Dark.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002810_URIANGER<tab>苦悩の末に至ったのが……この答え……。
より多くのクリスタルの力を一堂に集めんがため、
彼らを、「光の戦士」同士の対決に導きました……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002820_URIANGER<tab>Yet I knew from the beginning that this salvation would not come without sacrifice, for the instrument of the First's deliverance would of necessity be required to journey thither...there to remain, mayhap forever.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002820_URIANGER<tab>己の選択に、確信はあった……。
しかし同時に、あなたが原初世界へ戻る可能性を、
永久に奪うかもしれない選択だとも……わかっておりました。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002830_ALPHINAUD<tab>You orchestrated all of this not to save her, but to send her away!?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002830_ALPHINAUD<tab>それでは……まさか……
最初から、星の力を得たミンフィリアを、
第一世界に送り込むつもりで……！？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002840_URIANGER<tab>One life for one world. Such was the bargain, and you the coin, though it were not mine to spend.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002840_URIANGER<tab>私は、優しいあなたを、世界と引き換えにするのです。
……賛同を求めるべくもない、身勝手な選択だ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002850_MINFILIA<tab>(-Minfilia-)Have we not walked together in the light of the Crystal, and at Her bidding borne witness to the joys and sorrows of this land? Each and every one of you knows my heart. If this be the price I must pay, I pay it gladly.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002850_MINFILIA<tab>(-ミンフィリア-)わたしは、あなたたちとともに歩むことで、
世界の強さや悲しさを、聞いて、感じて、考えた……。
だからこそ、今度は私自身の命をかけて、役目を果たしたいの。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002860_THANCRED<tab>...You would go alone then?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002860_THANCRED<tab>……ひとりで行くつもりか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002870_MINFILIA<tab>(-Minfilia-)My dearest Thancred... You who have ever watched over me... I am truly grateful for all you have done on my behalf, as would my father be.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002870_MINFILIA<tab>(-ミンフィリア-)サンクレッド……いつもそばにいてくれて、ありがとう。
父も、ずっと見守ってくれていたあなたに、
とても感謝しているはずよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002880_MINFILIA<tab>(-Minfilia-)Your kindness, your compassion, your love... These are your gifts to me, and our gifts to them, forming a bond which transcends time and space.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002880_MINFILIA<tab>(-ミンフィリア-)あなたにもらった、あふれるほどの愛情を、
今度はわたしが、誰かにわけにいかないと。
……離れていても、心はそうして繋がるわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002890_THANCRED<tab>Sometimes I forget you are not the child I once knew. Make me proud.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002890_THANCRED<tab>……君なら、できるさ。
まったく、すっかり見違えたもんだ。
あんなに小さなレディだったってのに……な。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002900_MINFILIA<tab>(-Minfilia-)Long have I watched you from Hydaelyn's side. Watched as you nurtured and kept safe the light of the dawn.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002900_MINFILIA<tab>(-ミンフィリア-)あなたたちも……
ハイデリンの中から、ずっと見ていたわ。
「暁」の灯火を、希望の火を、繋いでくれてありがとう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002910_MINFILIA<tab>(-Minfilia-)The dark recesses of the world hide untold secrets and dangers. Thus do I entrust to you Tupsimati. I pray you keep to the path that you may never have need of it.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002910_MINFILIA<tab>(-ミンフィリア-)預かっていた、ルイゾワ様の名杖トゥプシマティよ……。
世界の真相も、闇の脅威も、まだすべてが暴かれてはいない。
くれぐれも気を付けて……信じた道を進んでいって。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002920_BLACKMAGEOFDARKNESS<tab>'Twould seem the power of our crystals is all but spent. Perhaps...if there is naught else to be done...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002920_BLACKMAGEOFDARKNESS<tab>我らの光のクリスタルは、力を使い果たしたようだ。
どのみち、打つ手がないのなら……
信じてみるのが、お前らしいのではないか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002930_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Hear me, servant of Hydaelyn. If you would have us place our trust in you, then I would ask a favor.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002930_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>おい、ハイデリンの使徒。
……お前を信じる代わりに、ひとつ頼みがある。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002940_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Take us with you. Take us home.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002940_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>俺たちの魂も、第一世界へ連れて行ってくれ。
あそこには、俺たちの冒険のすべてがある……
大事な故郷なんだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002950_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>We were blind to the truth once. So I tell you this, as one fool to another. Light, Dark, it doesn't matter. What matters is how you choose to use them.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002950_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>甘ッタレだったのは、こっちも同じさ。
だからこそ、俺たちの過去にも等しいお前に、伝えておく。
重要なのは、光か闇かじゃねぇ……お前自身の意志だ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002960_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>We made our choice, and you see what came of it. So please...forge a different path. Seize a better fate.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002960_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>こんなことになっちまって、言えた立場じゃないだろう。
だが……必ず掴みとれよ、俺たちとは違う未来を。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002970_MINFILIA<tab>(-Minfilia-)'Tis a strange feeling. So many times have I watched you depart, my heart filled with worry, and ever did you return to me in triumph.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002970_MINFILIA<tab>(-ミンフィリア-)送り出される側になるのは、なんだか不思議な気持ちね。
でも、あなたはいつも、困難な壁を乗り越え、
未来を拓いて帰ってきてくれた……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002980_MINFILIA<tab>(-Minfilia-)Someday, when I have found a way to free this star from Her sorrow, I promise you I shall repay the favor.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002980_MINFILIA<tab>(-ミンフィリア-)だからわたしも、役目を果たしてきます。
いつか、この星を、本当の意味で悲しみから解き放つ……
その方法を見つけたときに、きっとまた会いましょう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002990_MINFILIA<tab>Thank you, Lhaminn...for everything...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002990_MINFILIA<tab>愛してくれて ありがとう
大好きよ ラミン……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_003000_YDA<tab>Back in the solar! It's been too long since we were all together like this. Not since...not since after Moenbryda...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_003000_YDA<tab>……なんだか懐かしいね。
こうして、「暁の間」にみんなで集まるのなんて、
ムーンブリダのことがあって以来かな……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_003010_PAPALYMO<tab>Much has changed since then─we ourselves most of all.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_003010_PAPALYMO<tab>だけど、あのときとは顔ぶれが違う。
残った者も……あの日のままじゃないはずだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_003020_ALPHINAUD<tab>Though not all who were lost could be gathered here today, we may take comfort in the knowledge that those who are not are carrying on the fight.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_003020_ALPHINAUD<tab>遠い世界で戦ってくれている、ミンフィリアを含め……
ウルダハでの戦勝祝賀会で行方不明になった者は、
これで全員、所在が掴めたことになる。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_003030_TATARU<tab>While I am grateful to our friends in the north for their hospitality...it isn't half-good to be back!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_003030_TATARU<tab>逃げ延びた「雪の家」で消えかけていた、
「暁」の灯火が、やっとここまで戻ったんでっすね……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_003040_ALPHINAUD<tab>But, as Papalymo rightly said, much has changed since we last stood here. The Scions of the Seventh Dawn are not as they once were. Nor should we be.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_003040_ALPHINAUD<tab>ああ、そうだとも。
……だが、「暁の血盟」は、もとの形に戻るわけじゃない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_003050_ALPHINAUD<tab>Our travels in the north brought us into contact with a host of fine and generous people, and their selfless deeds served to show me that it is not lofty causes that should inform our actions, but our hearts.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_003050_ALPHINAUD<tab>私は、竜詩戦争をめぐる旅で、
多くの友に出会い、支えてもらって、知ったんだ……。
理屈ではなく、己の願いに従って進むことを。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_003060_ALPHINAUD<tab>And I hope that the Scions might continue in this manner: as individuals driven by individual principles. Provided we all sincerely desire to work towards Eorzea's salvation, I believe the paths we follow to achieve it need not─and should not─be dictated by any single ideal.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_003060_ALPHINAUD<tab>これからの「暁」にも、各々の願いとともにあってほしい。
もたらされる結果が、同じ「エオルゼアの救済」であっても、
そこに至るために選ぶ道や思いは、異なっているはずだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_003070_YSHTOLA<tab>Companions bound by a common purpose, free to go whither they will... The idea is not without merit.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_003070_YSHTOLA<tab>組織というより、協力関係にある仲間同士というわけね……
いいんじゃないかしら。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_003080_YSHTOLA<tab>Very well. I shall resume my research of the primals and the elder gods of Eorzea. Should anyone have need of my findings, you need only ask.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_003080_YSHTOLA<tab>私は引き続き、世界の真理を求めて、
蛮神や古の神を調査するつもり。
